alert.note: Alert for Vance; Warren (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 5:13PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Vance and Warren Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 513 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Norlina, or near Warrenton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Henderson, Warrenton, Norlina, Littleton, Middleburg, Macon, Afton, Lake Gaston, South Henderson and Wise. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
